response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,500,000 to us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Given its immense value to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,400,000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1400000}
